segments.text: Hey Jack . How were your classes this semester ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They were not too bad . I really liked my poli-sci class .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you consider it your favorite class ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know if I would call it my favorite , but it ranks up there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What class was your favorite then ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I took a business communication class last year and it was terrific .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I never took that yet . If that was your favorite , I think I will check it out .
segments.speaker: S1
